page.title: 18SHOPPING
page.content: {SHOPPING IN THE 80's a straight grey skirt and a white T- shirt with WHAM! written on it.Then I met mum at Mac Donalds(a fast food cafe)were we went for lunch.I ordered a Hamburger and we talked about what we bought.Mum had bought some Squirt, Quatro and Um Bungo to drink and Monster Munches,Stix,Whispa's and Clover Margarine Part Baked Bread, Lymeswold & Melbury cheese to put in my Roughneck lunchbox to take to school.She bought some Snack-a-Soup and Cup-a-Soup Special.Some Golden Brek,Fruit 'n' Nut Brek,and Kellogs start.When we had finished our lunch we went to the Midlands Bank cashpoint where we got some 1 pound coins,and 20 pence pieces,then we went home.
